AboutPage.title: Project Story
AboutPage.subtitle: The development story of a JavaScript learning game platform inspired by FlexboxFroggy

inspiration.title: The Beginning of Inspiration
inspiration.content1: Learning CSS Flex with FlexboxFroggy was an impressive experience. Rather than simply reading documentation, the concepts of Flexbox naturally became ingrained through writing code and moving the frog.
inspiration.content2: Having focused only on admin pages and dashboard development, I needed a completely new challenge.
inspiration.content3: "Could JavaScript's complex concepts also be gamified like this?" This thought sparked the beginning of the PenguinJS project.
inspiration.flexboxExample: "Move the frog onto the lily pad with justify-content: center"
inspiration.penguinExample: "Find your way through Closure Cave to rescue the penguin"

ideation.title: Ideation
ideation.content: "How can we visualize the call stack?" Materializing ideas through conversations with Claude

wireframe.title: Wireframing
wireframe.content: Sketching layouts in HTML and requesting Claude to implement. Rapidly experimenting with various layouts

iteration.title: Trial and Error
iteration.content: Refactored the layout system over 6 times. Realized the importance of design even without coding directly

futurePlans.title: Future Plans
futurePlans.item4: Expanding to other languages (Python, Go, etc.)

personalReflection.title: Reflections from Development
personalReflection.content1: I gained confidence that "I can actually create what I imagine." I realized that time spent thinking about what to build and how users will learn is more important than technical implementation.
personalReflection.content2: While the developer's role is changing with AI tools advancement, the ability to define problems and suggest solutions remains core.
personalReflection.quote: "Even without coding, developers are still needed" üöÄ

hero.title: Tech Stack & Architecture
hero.description: Explore the technical composition and design decisions of our interactive learning platform built with modern technologies

reactRef.description: Using refs instead of state to prevent unnecessary re-renders

componentAbstraction.description: Ensuring consistency with reusable layout components

thresholdAlerts.description: Warning at 80MB+ usage, critical alert at 120MB+
